#summary Provides an action to eliminate all Markers, without moving the caret anywhere.

= Introduction =

A simple plugin which provides a single command for eliminating all current markers in the system.

= Download = 

Primary download is http://www.rorybecker.me.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/CR_ClearAllMarkers/

= Installation =

Installation instructions can be found on the InstallInstructions page.

= Setup = 
Bind the "ClearAllMarkers" command to a key. I chose to bind to 'ESC'

= Usage =

  * Activate any time you like.
    * All marker should disappear.
    * Your caret should not move.

= Why did I build this =

Well for that you'll have to visit [http://rorybecker.blogspot.com/2009/06/crclearallmarkers.html my Blogpost] :)
